statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-2 \, x^{3} - 16 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x - 16 , -3 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4 , -4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4 , 5 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x + 4 , 23 \, x^{3} + 36 \, x^{2} - 16 \, x + 40\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
